about_the_game:
Setup -
Shaken from a living sleep, you awaken as a fugitive. You have been found out - being awake is forbidden - and whoever strays must be excised. The Surgeons - the city's enforcers - are on their way. You must gather what you can and run, and search for a way to escape your pursuers.
Journey through a dark dystopian city where humans have conquered time. Explore lost shadows where feral phantoms and entities sleep, and discover what lurks in the heart of this dark metropolis.



Unravel a mysterious narrative as you search for who sent you on this path. Find your way through winding alley ways, traverse rooftops, grand monuments, work your way through maze-like buildings, and meet characters who try to live in this harsh world outside the grasp of the Mind Maze, and find out if they will help you.

- Innovative stealth features.
- Unforgiving and high stakes combat.
- Be inventive and develop your own approach towards obstacles, maybe use a non-violent indirect method to evade your pursuers.
- Face a cast of formidable enemies that require different strategies to overcome.
- Dynamic A.I. that is proactive and will actively search for you.
- Enemies can predict the player's moves, and take shortcuts or block routes.
- Escalating tension as the Mind of the city searches for the player.
- Explore an enigmatic and dystopian city and atmosphere, inspired by noir and German Expressionism.
- And meet the people who persevere in this dark city.


Escalating Tension
Fight against time as you find a way to escape the city, before the Mind Maze activates. Over time the city narrows its gaze, ratcheting up the pressure with every wrong step you take. Sooner or later the city will find you - endure the increasing difficulty or find a way to delay it.

Unforgiving Combat
With no hand holding you will be thrown into brutal combat with relentless and aggressive enemies, each with their own unique abilities and tactics, which demand both grit and quick wits to overcome.
Use stealth, or plan ahead by setting traps to slow your pursuers down or to shake them off your trail.
The enemies in this metropolis are not so easily fooled - they learn from their engagements and will actively stalk and track you.
Some enemies will even exploit shadows and stealth.

Unique AI and Stealth
Clue System: Whether it be a blown out candle, bloodstains or dead bodies left behind by a previous battle, or a trail of footprints leading right to your location, every action you take leaves behind a lasting consequence. The more of a commotion you make, the more enemies will communicate and exchange intel and more effectively hunt you down. Be wary as even your shadow and your silhouette can betray you.

Equipment
At the start, choose from a selection of primary "perk" equipment, each influencing your abilities and means of survival, and having a drastic affect on your gameplay experience.

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: You awaken as a fugitive in a dystopian city. Choose your equipment and go! Run for your life as you are hunted down. Find a way to escape this dystopian city, in this action horror game with a innovative stealth system and immersive sim elements.
